TopicTitle: How can I switch within vessels?

Articles.Content: my kerbal just fall and I switch vessels with the orbit map,but when I try to switch again,I can't.Any solutions?

1 hour ago, Arga_Wibawa said:

my kerbal just fall and I switch vessels with the orbit map,but when I try to switch again,I can't.Any solutions?

He fell? From where?...and from how far up? He may be dead.

Make sure the tab for Kerbals on EVA is clicked in the tracker menu at the top of the window or he won't be tracked.

Also, an object has to be within the 2.5km "physics bubble" to switch to it via the keyboard. Best of luck!

Welcome to the forums!

Let me guess what your problem is:  the spaceship and the kerbal are right next to each other, so when you're looking at the orbital map and try to switch to the kerbal by clicking on him, you can't do it because it keeps selecting your spaceship instead.  Is that the issue?

Here's what you can do:  When you're in the flight view (i.e. looking at your ship, not in camera view), the [ and ] keys will switch instantly between nearby ships.  This is what R.i.m.P. is talking about, above, when he says "switch to it via the keyboard".

So if you're having trouble switching, just select the other one via the map view and then when it comes up hit [ or ] to switch.
